# callout

**Type Property**

The accessory, shown as an annotation callout on the map.

## Declaration

```swift
static var callout: MapItemDetailSelectionAccessoryStyle { get }
```

## Discussion

This uses the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MapItemDetailSelectionAccessoryStyle/CalloutStyle/automatic] callout style.

## Accessory styles

- **automatic**: A value that allows the framework to choose an appropriate callout style automatically.
- **caption**: An “Open in Apple Maps” link below the content’s label.
- **sheet**: The map item detail sheet.
